location: Roosevelt Road Section 3, Lane 244, Zhongzheng District, near Taipei Power Building MRT and Gongguan Station
notes: Award-winning 2024 iF Design residence with modern fixtures and professional management. Features three terraces (totaling ~20 ping) which require careful baby-proofing of railings. Top floor (7F/7F) with elevator access, 24-hour security, and smart climate control. Well-located near MRT stations and amenities.
